website_summaries.verdict: The perfect gift to hand out at the start of the party.
pros: Set includes 6 “Groom's Drinking Team” shot glasses and 1 additional “Groom Drinking Captain” shot glass
Glasses arrive in quality, individual packaging
Font is clear and easy to read
cons: This item may get expensive if you're buying for a large party

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my fiancé and his groomsmen, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Soanie LaPaix

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go along with the groomsmen gifts for my wedding. I think that my future husband and his buddies are going to love these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I love these! We needed a little something to give to all of his groomsmen for our wedding, and these are perfect. Great quality at a great price, and they were delivered so quickly. We can’t wait to give these to all the groomsmen!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shot glasses for my groomsmen as an addition to their main groomsmen gift and they all love them! Product is of great quality as well. Fast service and shipping! Highly recommend this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Fill it up and take a shot.
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice. Didn't realize they are glass. And the writing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, recieved with no damages. Perfect touch to celebrate the groom. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and nice
customer_reviews.text: Received my shot glasses extremely quickly and they were exactly as pictured. I’m very happy with my purchase and I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Missing grooms glass
customer_reviews.text: When I received this set it says set of 7. Opened the box and there are only 6 the grooms shot glass is missing and not in the box. Not very happy
customer_reviews.author: selena

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for asking groomsman
customer_reviews.text: The shot glasses were exactly how described, they arrived on time, and they were the perfect way to ask my groomsman to be in my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got these very quick and very pleased with the product quality
customer_reviews.author: Alyissa parson

customer_reviews.title: Groomsmen Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I was totally satisfied with these items!!! Just what l needed to kick off my big day with my brothers (groomsmen)!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Jamaal Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good work
customer_reviews.text: It looked very nice. Cant wait to hand it out to the groomsmen...
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Morris

customer_reviews.title: Missing shot glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Arrived with 5 shot glasses not 7.
customer_reviews.author: jason shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Looked just like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Got these shot glasses for groomsmen and bridesmaid gifts, everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product good material using it for my wedding thanks to you
customer_reviews.author: Judith Owino

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Looks better in person than in the pictures. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: martiin freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be a good quality glass which should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Simply gorgeous, and elegant. Loved the gift boxes they came in..❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Really great gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé was having a hard time finding gifts for his groomsmen. This set is perfect. It came well wrapped and in good condition. The shot glasses are standard size. The font is clear and is nicely printed. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the groomsmen in the wedding and they loved it. Everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: It was just as I expected them to be! Groomsmen loved them for a proposal gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I purchased these shot glasses to give during our engagement party when we do wedding party proposals. They were a great asset.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Iris

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These made perfect gifts to add to the grooms gift bags and were a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Groomsmen Gifts Groom's Drinking Team Shot Glasses - Pack of 6 Groom's Drinking Team Member + 1 Groom's Drinking Team Captain - 1.5 oz - Bachelor Party Favors
feature_bullets: Perfect gift for your Groomsmen or wedding parties
High Quality Libbey Shot Glasses with 1.5 oz capacity.
Dishwasher Safe! Dimensions; 2" W x 2.25" H
Well packaged and ready to give as a gift!
